cookiesPolicy.title: Cookie Policy
cookiesPolicy.intro: We use cookies to enhance your experience and analyze traffic on our website.
cookiesPolicy.whatAreCookies: Cookies are small text files stored on your device that help the website remember your preferences and usage patterns.
typesList: Essential cookies: Required for core site functionality.
Analytics cookies: Help us understand how visitors interact with the site.
cookiesPolicy.manageText: You can accept or reject non-essential cookies via the banner or through your browser settings.
cookiesPolicy.personalDataText: We don’t use cookies to directly identify you. Some analytics data may be collected anonymously.
cookiesPolicy.changesText: We may update this policy. Check this page regularly for changes.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: We are committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains what we collect and how we use it.

sections.title: 1. What we collect
sections.text: Your email address (when you subscribe) and anonymized usage data via cookies.

sections.title: 2. How we collect it
sections.text: Via forms you fill in, and automatically through cookies.

sections.title: 3. Why we collect it
sections.text: To keep you updated with news and updates from CD Estepona Fans.

sections.title: 4. Third parties
sections.text: We use services like Mailchimp and Google Analytics, which may collect and process data on our behalf.

sections.title: 5. Your rights
sections.text: You may unsubscribe at any time and request removal of your data.

sections.title: 6. Contact
sections.text: Use the contact form on our website for privacy-related questions.
